p: Ortiz-Duarte et al. [ 155] demonstrated that compared to uncoated samples, Ag-CS NC coatings obtained from red claw crayfish successfully maintained a lower respiration rate, controlled the loss of firmness, retained high total vitamin C content, while reduced translucency and promoted good sensory characteristics during storage. Therefore, this coating displayed potential as an application in the fresh produce industry to extend the shelf life of these products.
